english.segment1: Time is running out, come save. Death is creeping in, come save. We humble ourselves and seek Your face. Pour out Your mercy like rain
english.segment2: [Chorus:]. Your sons and your daughters cry for You. The waves of the waters reach for You. All of creation rises up and screams out Your name. Oh Lord, come save
english.segment3: Addicted to our pride, come save. Consumed in self-delight, come save. Break us and free us from these chains. We desperately need Your grace
english.segment5: Come awaken us from our sleep. Come bring us to our knees. Come whisper truth in our ears. Come save
